headlines.description: Arsenal strengthened their top-four credentials while damaging Manchester United's thanks to a 3-1 Premier League win on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal boost top-four hopes, add to Utd misery

headlines.description: A below-par Leicester City played out a 0-0 draw against Aston Villa at home in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Leicester held to goalless draw by Aston Villa

headlines.description: Gabriel Jesus put on a stunning performance with four goals and an assist as Manchester City secured a comfortable 5-1 win over Watford.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jesus bags four as Man City thrash Watford

headlines.description: Newcastle Brazilian contingent starred as Joelinton scored a brace and Bruno Guimaraes netted in an emphatic 3-0 win at Norwich.
headlines.shortLinkText: Samba style propels Newcastle to 3-0 win over Norwich

headlines.description: Tottenham's chances of finishing in the top four took another blow after a dismal goalless draw at Brentford.
headlines.shortLinkText: Spurs UCL hopes dented after draw at Brentford
